abstract.t: This document, part of the Lemonade Working Group, describes the BestCurrent Practice for streaming multimedia attachments received by aresource constrained and/or mobile device from a IMAP server. Itallows such clients, which are limited in storage space andbandwidth, to play video and audio content which is attached to emailmessages. The document describes a profile for making use of theexisting IMAP URLAUTH extension [2] and the "Netann" SIP MediaService as described in RFC 4240 [1].
